scripts.build: npm run build:photo && npm run copy:photo && npm run build:main
scripts.build:photo: npm --prefix sites/photo ci && npm --prefix sites/photo run build
scripts.copy:photo: rm -rf sites/main/public/photography && mkdir -p sites/main/public/photography && cp -R sites/photo/_site/* sites/main/public/photography/
scripts.build:main: npm --prefix sites/main ci && npm --prefix sites/main run build
